My battery with Wifi Calling and in Airplane is always fantastic. It makes my iPhone battery AMAZING at home. 10 hours screen on time with iP 14 Pro Max. 16 Pro Max with this would be a lot better I think.

NPC scared about battery life why..
i just don't care about battery but NPC is false..
yes npc false
I don’t know what happened but my 16 Plus had 100% Capacity and now it’s down to 99%. I have only had the phone since September (a week after it released).

About the same, I've not seen much of a change, however since 18.3 I've noticed my battery health start to deplete. That could be coincidence though and it's not plummeted considering my phone is a year and a half old.
iPhone 13 was at 77% before after to 18.4 and just after a day, I lost 1%.

I have two iPhone 13 Pro Max one with 80% (iOS 17.5.1)battery health & other 87% (iOS 18.3)battery health’the one with 80% health with the iOS 17.5.1 last longer then the 88% battery health with iOS 18.3 

Plz how is this possible
Worse than on 18.3.x. 16 Pro Max from October 24’
The worst battery life experience I’ve ever had on iPhone was with iOS 17, 18 has treated me very well and that’s no different with 18.4

Tbh the battery is better. (16PM). 

18.3 I need to recharge a bit now the battery is holding on though the day even tho my phone is constant running Spotify or YouTube in the background! I’m really satisfied w/ the battery performance.

I use the iPhone 15 in the iOS 18.3 version and I won't update. The device does not heat up, does not discharge quickly and is not even lowering the percentage of battery life. Mania of updating the device's system all the time leads to some inconveniences.
I don't know to be honest
The battery on my 16 Pro Max went crazy.”
